altername_name: Gemu de Demashita! Pawapafu Garuzu Zetto
name: Game de Demashita! Powerpuff Girls Z
overview: "They're Here! Powerpuff Girls Z: The Game" was released by Namco Bandai games, labled under Bandai. A single player action game under the Board Game Genre. In which the player must do things while they travel around a board and win the game. Usually by reaching a certain goal or target spot.
